website_summaries.verdict: Simple and inexpensive all-rubber putter grip that adds very little weight to the putter.
pros: Provides a good value in a putter grip
You'll have a tacky feel from the rubber material in this basic putter grip
Offered in 3 different color options, all of which are inexpensive
The grip includes molded textures that help with maintaining control
cons: Thin material may not work well for some
You may want to add grip tape

customer_reviews.title: Superb Putter Grip!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this grip for a little over 2 weeks and am really surprised with how good this grip is considering the low price. It's extremely tacky so you never feel like you need to overgrip and the textures molded into the grip add a nice feel to it. It also looks incredible in person of which the over saturated in color JPEG-artifact picture above doesn't really do it justice. So I took a few of my own showing the back and front so you can get a better idea of it's looks, shape, texture and color.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi386

customer_reviews.title: Really good putter grip
customer_reviews.text: I golf 3-5 times a week. In the past my putter grips were always Jumbo, or Oversize and big brand names. ie: Super Stroke, Lampkin, Winn. I wanted to try a smaller putter grip size just to see if it made any difference, and, save a buck using this Karma brand. So, I see no downside to the smaller putter grip. Tossed a 77 today, on punched greens. Calling this Karma putter grip good.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Golfer
customer_reviews.text: I sucked at golf before I put these grips on and I sucked after... I did have great luck with installing these on my clubs and pink ones on my wife's clubs! (Not Hard) Just make sure you make a little mark at about where the bottom of the grip should go and move fast. Maybe about 5-10 minutes a grip.
customer_reviews.author: Granty Grant

customer_reviews.title: This one feels great in the hands and offers more texture and feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fatter putter grip this season with a little more grip than the superstroke. I had a superstroke but it came loose after a season. This one feels great in the hands and offers more texture and feel than my superstroke. Love it! Im a feel putter and average 31 putts a round with this grip. Down from 32 putts last season.
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grip For My Hand Size
customer_reviews.text: Awhile back as I was testing putters, one of them had this karma grip on it and it felt good in my hands. I ended up buying 2 of these and installed them on my putters. I like the hard feel of this grip vs squishy soft feel of some other brands, as I don't have feel like I have to grip it so hard to keep a firm, but not death grip on it. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good putter grip and size for the average golfer. It assists in locking your wrists for better control. As with any change the grip is only as good as the person using it and it takes practice to dial it in.
customer_reviews.author: Surbs

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1. Great product, midsize is perfect. I already ordered 2 more for another putter and a spare for maybe another day... This is high quality. I just regripped all my irons Golf Pride midsize. Tried the Super stroke big grip, didn't work for me, cut that off , 6 less putts with this on 9 holes, o ya...
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter grip for the money
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing I was disappointed in this purchase was it did not come with the tape needed to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Karma Dual Touch Midsize Putter Grip
customer_reviews.text: Grip went on my putter perfectly after removing old grip with hook blade knife, applying grip tape and solvent. NOTE: Knife, grip tape and solvent were not provided with grip, I had those from a previous grip install. Grip feels fine when putting. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: My Amazon Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great putter grip..great price
customer_reviews.text: Great mid-size grip...cannot tell the difference from much more expensive alternatives. Easy to install. Great price.good grip.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive grip
customer_reviews.text: I had a backup putter that desperately needed regrouping. Not wanting to spend a lot of money on the Golf Pride's that I usually buy, I chose this grip instead. What a great value. Feels great, looks good and does the job really well.
customer_reviews.author: GIANT PLAN

customer_reviews.title: Tacky and it fits my hand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third grip like this I have in play. Would say..... try this grip out, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: john e. harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great grips
customer_reviews.text: These are great grips. They were easy to put on my irons. I especially love the feel of this grip with my putter. I could tell the difference in my putts.
customer_reviews.author: Influence52

customer_reviews.title: Love these grips!
customer_reviews.text: I build / repair golf clubs for myself and friends. More importantly, I play golf, not well, but I know a value product when I use it!
customer_reviews.author: wtreillysr

customer_reviews.title: Great Putter Grip at any Price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased different grips over the past year. I’ve spent more money on other grips, but I’m not happier with any of them, than I am with this grip.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Install was super easy. Just make sure you got it on straight. Feel of the grip is pretty good. It was a great replacement for an old worn out grip.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Should
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to install, but once done it should be easier next one. Feels good, I ’m happy with it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great value, installation, quality and looks darn good too!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install for a first time newb like me. The size was perfect for my hands and feels is great to me for putting. A+ for value, install and even quality. My putter also looks like it had a professional makeover.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: midsize putter grip
customer_reviews.text: This grip has a good feel and the price was unbeatable. At this price you can re-grip every year.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of the jumbo fad grips I got this grip and Im making many more putts. Just the right firmness and tackiness.
customer_reviews.author: DavenRitaVille

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for a standard putter grip like i have always used, don't like all the new fat grips and all that bs. Good grip and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Gibsontennis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice medium sized tapered putter grip.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this grip and installed on my Brother - in Laws putter. He didn’t want the new oversized non tapered grip style on his putter. This is a Nice medium size and tapered grip. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little small, but really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Grip is a little smaller than I expected, even reading reviews on it being on the smaller side for a putter grip. Comes in and out of the bag really easy though, so that’s really nice. The contoured shape feels really nice in the hands, and it seems pretty rugged. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Great grip for an old putter. Total transformation. Love the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: J White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice and tacky and not too large. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grip for a putter
customer_reviews.text: Grip was delivered on time. I Installed on a putter. Has good soft feel. Have only used it for two rounds but I think it will hold up fine. Color was as shown in picture. I would buy this product again. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Desertrat

customer_reviews.title: Nice putter grip
customer_reviews.text: Good feel in a midsize putter grip. Very reasonable price. Surprised by the quality which was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great feel.
customer_reviews.text: Great soft touch, feels great in your hand. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: great sized grip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pistol grip, and liked it, but felt the midsize would be better suited for me. Got it and its a great feeling grip, fits perfectly for me. Give them a try, you won't regret the putts you roll in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: very good grip
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that the one side is flat to line up your thumbs...
customer_reviews.author: Dale Heppner

customer_reviews.title: Good product - good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great. Good price for value. Feels good - so far it hasn't lowered my putting strokes!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: order some tylenol
customer_reviews.text: got two rounds of golf out of it cracking, poor feel
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: cheap, goes on easy, does the job. I wanted a thicker grip. This one is about 3x the original. I was looking for 6x.
customer_reviews.author: chris roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Old putter grip deteriorated. I replaced it (same as any other installation of grips). These have a fantastic feel! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: I really like this putter grip
customer_reviews.text: I really like this putter grip. Nothing fancy, but it feels great. I'm putting well currently, so I'm sure I'll hate it as soon as that streak ends, but for now...
customer_reviews.author: Bucklesteros

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip for a putter. Well worth the add-on price of under $2. Great buy. Well made. Just apply with soapy water and slide it on. When it dries you are good to go. FORE!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and the color was what I wanted. Bought 5 putter grips so I could get free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: james harbour

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Grip With Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this style grip over the tree trunk models people are going to these days. This works great for me and has a really nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Fred F

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking grip
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my putter. Recommend getting a gripping kit and make the job easy. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Kuhns III

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my hand for my putting style. Helps me align my puts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel.
customer_reviews.text: Love the feeling of the grip, although I am not certain that the grip is truly mid-sized.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip. Fits perfectly in my hands
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip. Fits perfectly in my hands. Easy to install. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim from Panama City, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great putter grip with great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. I like the feel and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the blue and orange grips. They feel perfect in my hands and look very nice. I was completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grip for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip. Have not put it on yet but feels good...comfortably tacky, good texture.
customer_reviews.author: Awp

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good Grip and a Great Price All my putters grips were replaced for this model
customer_reviews.author: Luis D Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Way too short
customer_reviews.text: This grip is extremely short and has a strange taper.
customer_reviews.author: SKCL

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced and comfortable grip.
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip! Well balanced and I like the feel. The Red colour maybe a bit much for some - but I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Yuvraj Chadha

customer_reviews.title: Go on line to  show how to install the grips right.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel of the putter grips. This putter helps my game. Grips are easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy / brought new life to my old putter
customer_reviews.author: Oilslick

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Dried Out in 3 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: The Grip felt great for about 6 rounds and then became dry and slick. Don't know if I received a lemon but it is in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use, it has already spoiled everything Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: cyc

customer_reviews.title: Have extra tape they don’t include enough to do all pieces
customer_reviews.text: We loved them and they were relatively easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Filena singer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable grip. I don't use golfing gloves and it is still solid.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Carlson

customer_reviews.title: great feel
customer_reviews.text: sent this to my son, he liked the feel so much I sent him 2 more for his other putters
customer_reviews.author: james a. reda

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!
customer_reviews.text: Great putter grip for the money. I would highly recommend this grip.
customer_reviews.author: DALE J.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a mid-sized grip
customer_reviews.text: I used two tape wraps and the grip is still not mid-size. It is also a little short.
customer_reviews.author: FL Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, good midsize feel
customer_reviews.text: For the $$, you can't touch it. Nice look, good midsize feel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great grips for the price. I have used the high dollar grips and these do just as well for a whole lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Silky

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Can't imagine grips for triple the price would ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Can't imagine grips for triple the price would be any better than this. Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cumming

customer_reviews.title: Oh YeaH ⛳️
customer_reviews.text: NicE GriP, NicE PricE!! Perfect size, I downgraded from an Jumbo Oversized putter grip. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kelis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, however the size is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The putter grip is smaller than a midsize. Very difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost and quality are great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Wilson 8802 putter. Arrived quickly and has a perfect feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Selvey

customer_reviews.title: This one made it easy and feels very nice on my Odyssey White Hot
customer_reviews.text: I am always worried about putting a grip on my putter. This one made it easy and feels very nice on my Odyssey White Hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: The grip has a great feel. Great price for the product
customer_reviews.author: don simpson

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel, and the advertised size of the grip
customer_reviews.author: Bernard w.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than standard pistol grip, works very well and a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: ... season and it seems to be holding up as good or better than grips that are twice as
customer_reviews.text: Half way through the first season and it seems to be holding up as good or better than grips that are twice as expensive
customer_reviews.author: Michelle OKeeffe

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Have regripped several of my putters. Great looking grip with a good feel when putting.
customer_reviews.author: LRA
